Title: DRGauges
Description: DRGauges are a collection of gauges controls developed in Silverlight for use in LOB applications that deal with data reading and measuring through gauges. These are realistic looking gauges that will make your apps stand out and have a more appealing user interface.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
DRGauges are a collection of gauges controls developed in Silverlight for use in LOB applications that deal with data reading and measuring through gauges. These are realistic looking gauges that will make your apps stand out and have a more appealing user interface.
For more information go to http://www.drcoderz.com/Downloads/25/Download-DRGauges.
